## ReadableEthersGivety class

Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableGivety](./lib-base.readablegivety.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ReadableEthersGivety implements ReadableGivety 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableGivety](./lib-base.readablegivety.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableEthersGivety` class.
